axes.description: A string indicating the order of the axes of the image data in the TiffPages of the TiffSeries.

dtype.description: The data type of the image data in the TiffPages of the TiffSeries.

index.description: An integer indicating the index of the TiffSeries in a TIFF file that contains multiple TiffSeries.

is_multifile.description: A boolean indicating whether the TiffSeries is part of a multi-file TIFF.

is_pyramidal.description: A boolean indicating whether the TiffSeries is stored in a pyramidal format, where each subsequent TiffPage contains a lower resolution representation of the image data.

keyframe.description: An integer indicating the index of the TiffPage in the TiffSeries that serves as a reference frame for the other TiffPages.

kind.description: A string indicating the type of image data stored in the TiffPages of the TiffSeries.

level_count.description: An integer indicating the number of levels in a pyramidal TiffSeries.

ndim.description: An integer indicating the number of dimensions of the image data in the TiffPages of the TiffSeries.

offset.description: The offset in bytes from the beginning of the TIFF file where the TiffSeries starts.

shape.description: A tuple indicating the shape of the image data in the TiffPages of the TiffSeries.

size.description: The total number of elements in the image data of the TiffPages of the TiffSeries.

transform.description: A matrix representing a transformation applied to the image data in the TiffPages of the TiffSeries.

levels.description: A list of TiffSeries that make each level.
